create_contact[source]

create_contact(contact=None, hapikey=None)

Create a contact.

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

contact_exists[source]

contact_exists(value, property='email', operator='EQ', hapikey=None)

Check if a contact exists.

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

get_contact[source]

get_contact(value, property='email', operator='EQ', hapikey=None)

Get contact.

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

delete_contact[source]

delete_contact(vid=None, hapikey=None)

Delete a contact.

{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
# tests

test_email = 'fake_user@example.com'

# create an example minimal contact
contact_data = {
    "email": test_email
}

# create contact
result_create = create_contact(contact_data)
assert result_create['properties']['email']['value'] == test_email

time.sleep(5)

# check it exists
assert contact_exists(test_email) == True

# get contact
contact = get_contact(test_email)
assert contact['properties']['email'] == test_email

# delete contact
result_delete = delete_contact(vid=contact['id'])
assert result_delete['deleted'] == True
{% endraw %}
